select item_Idx, sum(people) as "PEOPLE", hotel_idx, check_in_date, check_out_date from user_oders_table3 where check_in_date <= #{startDay}
or check_out_date >= #{endDay} group by item_idx, check_in_date, hotel_idx, check_out_date

SELECT count(*) from item_table3 where item_idx not in( select hotel_num from ( select item_idx as "HOTEL_NUM", count(*) as "ROOM_COUNT" from ( select detail.item_idx, detail.hotel_idx from (select * from user_oders_table3 where hotel_idx is not null) oders, hotel_detail_table3 detail where oders.hotel_idx(+) = detail.hotel_idx and ((oders.check_in_date < #{endDayHotel} and oders.check_out_date > #{startDayHotel}) or detail.hotelRoom_people < #{people}) group by detail.item_idx, detail.hotel_idx ) group by item_idx ) where room_count >= (select count(*) from hotel_detail_table3 where item_idx = hotel_num)) and item_category = 'hotel' and country = #{country}

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY item_idx desc) AS rn, item_Idx, country, item_Name, regdate, introduce, image, address, item_Category, people, price, tel, item_Option, item_Url from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY item_idx asc) AS rn, item_Idx, country, item_Name, regdate, introduce, image, address, item_Category, people, price, tel, item_Option, item_Url from item_table3 where item_idx not in ( select item_idx from ( select item.item_idx, count(*) as "OVERNUM" from item_table3 item, (select item_idx, sum(people) as "PEOPLE", check_in_date, check_out_date, hotel_idx from user_oders_table3 where (check_in_date >= #{startDaySpot} and check_out_date <= #{endDaySpot}) and hotel_idx is null group by item_idx, check_in_date, check_out_date, hotel_idx) oders where item.item_Idx = oders.item_Idx and item.people < oders.people + #{people} group by item.item_idx ) where TO_DATE(#{endDaySpot}, 'YY/MM/DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDaySpot}, 'YY/MM/DD') + 1 <= overnum union select hotel_num from ( select item_idx as "HOTEL_NUM", count(*) as "ROOM_COUNT" from ( select detail.item_idx, detail.hotel_idx from (select * from user_oders_table3 where hotel_idx is not null) oders, hotel_detail_table3 detail where oders.hotel_idx(+) = detail.hotel_idx and ((oders.check_in_date < #{endDayHotel} and oders.check_out_date > #{startDayHotel}) or detail.hotelRoom_people < #{people}) group by detail.item_idx, detail.hotel_idx ) group by item_idx ) where room_count >= (select count(*) from hotel_detail_table3 where item_idx = hotel_num)) and rownum <= #{countTotal} - (#{amount} * #{page} - #{amount}) and country = #{country}) where rn > #{countTotal} - (#{amount} * #{page})
